name: Space Doof (stinkyepengwing)
description:
Controls

Lane 1: Key 1, or Key A

Lane 2: Key 2, or Key S

Lane 3: Key 3, or Key J

Lane 4: Key 4, or Key K

Space Doof is a test of speed and concentration wherein, a series of space objects appear at certain speeds but not all of them are to be shot. Shooting a gem will result into a subtraction in points and bullets. It is a simple game that you could play anywhere!
